ExplorerBar.itemBatchUninstallInProgressTip: Batch uninstall in progress, please wait while removal of all apps is finished...

DlgAddNewStartupProgram.checkHighestPriviledges: Run task with the highest privileges

DlgPreferences.checkSkipUAC: Use Windows Task Scheduler to bypass User Account Control confirmation dialog (when necessary)
DlgPreferences.checkSkipUACHelpText:
Activating this option allows to bypass UAC confirmation when launching Uninstall Tool ("Do you want to allow this app to make changes to your device?"). The option can be quite useful when Uninstall Tool is launched often.

When turned on, Uninstall Tool creates a Windows Task Scheduler elevated task which is executed every time you'd like to run the app. 

Applies to Windows Vista and higher when UAC is turned on.
DlgPreferences.checkCheckForUpdates: Check for updates on program startup
DlgPreferences.checkControlPanelIcon: Vis Uninstall Tool ikon i kontrolpanel
DlgPreferences.checkShellExtension: Add 'Install and Trace' command for setup files (exe/msi) to the Windows Explorer context menu
DlgPreferences.checkTotalCommander: Gå til program-mappen med Total Commander
DlgPreferences.subitemsHelpText:
Parent items can be expanded/collapsed with mouse or using Left/Right keyboard keys. 

'Initially collapsed' is recommended option, but users are able to set 'Initially expanded' to display all updates initially. Users who get used to Uninstall Tool versions prior to 3.3 can choose 'Always expanded' option which also disables expand/collapse functionality. 

When using search filter collapsed items are expanded automatically if one or more sub-items matches the filter.
DlgPreferences.checkDisplayPopup: Vis pupup-vindu med siste installerte program
DlgPreferences.checkRecentOnSecondaryToolbar: Display recent programs in the secondary toolbar
DlgPreferences.staticWizardDesctiption: Avinstallerings Veiviser ™ hjelper deg med å slette uønsket software fra systemet, uten å måtte stole på den innebygde avinstallereren som kanskje ikke fjerner alle filer og/eller registeroppføringer. Etter å ha kjørt standard avinstallering, utfører Uninstall Tool en dypskanning på registret og filsystemet for å finne ugyldige registeroppføringer og filer. Uninstall Wizard always runs for traced programs.

UninstallWizard.captionQuestionUninstallBatch: Do you want to uninstall %u selected apps?
UninstallWizard.statusUninstallInfo: Uninstall Wizard first launches the associated default uninstall program and cleans up leftovers afterwards.
UninstallWizard.statusUninstallInfoBatch: Uninstall Wizard first launches the associated default uninstall program for each of the app. Then it displays the list of all leftovers to clean up.
UninstallWizard.statusPerformingUninstall: Performing standard uninstall using built-in uninstaller, which may require user interaction.
UninstallWizard.statusScanning: Skanner for ugyldige filer, mapper og registeroppføringer...
UninstallWizard.statusScanningTraced: Generating the list of leftover traced items, please wait...
UninstallWizard.staticScanStatusFound: Uninstall Tool har funnet at følgende programspor fortsatt finnes på pc-en. Vennligst sjekk disse nøye og når du er klar til å fjerne disse, klikk ”Ferdig”.
UninstallWizard.staticScanStatusRemovedBatch: All selected leftovers have been successfully removed.
UninstallWizard.staticHyperlinkRemovalLogTooltip: Create detailed removal log file and open it
UninstallWizard.staticHyperlinkExportTooltip: Export scan results to XML file
UninstallWizard.staticOverallInfo: %d filer (%s) og %d registeroppføringer finnes fortsatt på pc-en

DelayedFilesRemovalDialog.Title: Some files were not deleted
DelayedFilesRemovalDialog.Instruction1: The following files were not deleted because they are in use by the system:
DelayedFilesRemovalDialog.Instruction2: These files will be removed automatically on next system reboot.

RunningProcessesDialog.Title: Force terminate running processes?
RunningProcessesDialog.Instruction2: It's recommended to terminate them manually before removal, but Uninstall Wizard can force terminate them.

InstallTracker.Title: Install and Trace a Program
InstallTracker.TitleAppend: Install and Trace, append traced data to '%s'
InstallTracker.checkMinimize: Minimize Uninstall Tool to system tray during installation
InstallTracker.staticRevertInfo: Revert option attepts to delete all file system/registry items created during the installation tracing
InstallTracker.installTip1: Proceed with installation as usual while Uninstall Tool is watching for it. Tracing will be stopped automatically when all processes are finished or you have to stop it manually when setup is completed
InstallTracker.installTip2: Please make sure than no other installation is currently running
InstallTracker.installTip3: If a previous version of this program is already installed, you should remove it first before installing a newer version
InstallTracker.trayIconTooltip: See right-click menu to stop or view tracing log
InstallTracker.trayIconText: Proceed with installation as usual while Uninstall Tool is watching for it. Tracing will be stopped automatically when all processes are finished or you have to stop it manually (right-click menu) when setup is completed
InstallTracker.logStartingServiceError1: Error: CisUtMonitor service is still stopping
InstallTracker.logStartingServiceError2: Error: CisUtMonitor startup is timed out
InstallTracker.logStartingServiceError3: Error: Cannot start the CisUtMonitor service (error %u)
InstallTracker.logStartingServiceError4: Error: Cannot open the CisUtMonitor service. Please reinstall the program.
InstallTracker.logServiceStopError: Error: Failed to stop the tracking service
InstallTracker.logServiceVersionOlder: Monitor version is: 0x%x, should be 0x%x. Please reinstall the program.
InstallTracker.logTrackingStartingEror: Error: Cannot start the setup process (error %u)
InstallTracker.logTrackingCannotStart: Error: Cannot run the monitor. Please reinstall the program.
InstallTracker.logTrackingStoppedByUser: Tracing is stopped by a user
InstallTracker.logMSIServiceError1: Error: Failed to open MSI service
InstallTracker.logMSIServiceError2: Error: Cannot start the MSI service
InstallTracker.logMSIServiceError3: Error: Cannot query MSI service status

InstallTrackerCustomEntryDialog.Title: No new installation entries were found during the tracing. Generally it means that the program is not installed correctly, but if you're sure that installation went fine you may create a new custom program in the Apps list. All currently found traces will belong to it.
InstallTrackerCustomEntryDialog.checkCreateCustomEntry: I'd like to create a custom item in the list

InstallTrackerMultipleEntries.Caption: Multiple installation entries detected
InstallTrackerMultipleEntries.Title: Multiple installation entries were detected in Windows Registry after the installation. Please select the main item to display in the Apps list with a special icon in the 'Traced' column. Consider that when removing traced data of the main item, Uninstall Tool will also remove traced data of all dependent items.

DependentItemsDialog.Title: Uninstall '%s'
DependentItemsDialog.Footer: You installed '%s' with Install Tracker tracing enabled and the items above were installed as well. It means that when using Uninstall Wizard every dependent traced component will be removed too. When selecting removal only of current item, tracing data will be ignored and Uninstall Wizard will scan for leftover data referred to this program.

RelatedItemsDialog.Title: Uninstall '%s'
RelatedItemsDialog.Instruction: The following apps are related which means that uninstalling of them will removall all others. Are you sure you want to remove all these apps?

UninstallWizardConfirmation.staticConfirm: Standard avinstallerer er ferdig. Ønsker du å foreta en dypskanning av registeret og filsystemet etter ugyldige registeroppføringer og filer?
UninstallWizardConfirmation.checkDontAskAgain: Husk valget og ikke spør igjen (kan forandres i Innstillinger)

UnregDlg.staticExpired:
Prøvetiden er omme.
Du har prøvd programmet med full funksjonalitet i 30 dager

 Hvis du fortsatt vil bruke programmet, klikk på 'Kjøp'.
UnregDlg.staticTrial: Denne prøveversjonen av Uninstall Tool kan brukes i 30 dager. Etter at prøveperioden er over, må du kjøpe det eller avinstallere det.

EnterKeyDlg.Title: Please enter your name and code from the registration e-mail:

Messages.msgUninstallFailed: Avinstallering mislykket.\nVil du fjerne programinformasjonen fra registret og slette filene?
Messages.msgForceRemovalQuestion: Er du sikker på at du vil kjøre tvungen avinstallering av dette programmet?
Messages.msgForceRemovalQuestionBatch: Are you sure you want to perform force removal of the following programs?
Messages.msgForceRemovalDescription: Tvungen fjerning av listen vil ikke kjøre tilhørende avinstallerer. Den vil kun slette alle systemfiler og registeroppføringer som tilhører dette programmet. Du bør kun bruke denne funksjonen på foreldete eller ugyldige oppføringer.
Messages.msgForceRemovalDescriptionTraced: Force removal of a traced program will perform ultra fast and thorough removal without running its associated uninstaller. It will erase all file system and registry items traced during installation.
Messages.msgForceRemovalDescriptionBatch: Batch Force Removal is an advanced feature and should be used carefuly. It will not run associated uninstallers and will only scan for leftover file system/registry items and display them in a merged list that requires a precise review. The most thorough and accurate removal is performed for programs traced with Install Tracker.
Messages.msgRemoveUninstallTool: Er du sicker på at du vil fjerne Uninstall Tool fra datamaskinen?
Messages.msgRemoveEntryQuestion: Er du sikker på at du vil fjerne denne oppføringen?
Messages.msgRemoveEntryQuestionBatch: Are you sure you want to remove these entries?
Messages.msgRemoveEntryDescription: Denne funksjonen vil kun fjerne denne enheten fra listen. Ingen gjenværende register eller filsystem enheter vil bli slettet. Du bør kun bruke denne funksjonen på gamle eller ugyldige oppføringer.
Messages.msgRemoveEntryFailed: Kunne ikke slette registeroppføringen for denne enheten. \nDu har kanskje ikke tilgang til den.
Messages.msgForceCancelWaiting: Are you sure you want to force cancel uninstallation of this program?
Messages.msgForceCancelWaitingFooter: Force cancelletion should be perfomed only when default uninstall program is freezed or you urgently need to stop all currently running uninstall processes. Correct cancellation should be done in program's default uninstaller because force cancellation may cause unpredictable effects.
Messages.msgTracedItem: Traced item '%s' is now displayed in the program list with a special icon in the 'Traced' column.
Messages.msgTracedItemAppended: Traced data is now added to the previously traced item '%s'.
Messages.msgTracedItemAppendedNote: Please note that new installation items will be treated as dependent entries and can be removed later together with '%s' (upon confirmation).
Messages.msgUndoTracing: Are you sure you want Uninstall Tool to forget all traced data of this program?
Messages.msgTrackingServiceNotInstalled: Cannot open the CisUtMonitor service. Please reinstall the program
Messages.msgTrackingServiceNotInstalled2: The Uninstall Tool tracking service ('CisUtMonitor') is not installed on this system. \n\nDo you wish to install it now?
Messages.msgTrackingServiceNotInstalled3: The Uninstall Tool tracking service ('CisUtMonitor') is not installed on this system.
Messages.msgTrackingServiceInstallationOK: The service is successfully installed. \n\nYou can uninstall it later using the 'RemoveService.cmd' file.
Messages.msgTrackingServiceInstallationUnknownErr: Failed to install a service - unknown reason, please contact support for assistance.
Messages.msgTrackingServiceRemoved: The Uninstall Tool tracking service ('CisUtMonitor') is uninstalled from this computer.
Messages.msgTrackingServiceUpdate: The installed 'CisUtMonitor' service version (%u) is older than current (%u). \n\nDo you wish to update?
Messages.msgTrackingServiceUpdateSuccess: The latest version of service is successfully installed. You must reboot your computer before using Install Tracker.
Messages.msgNothingToSave: There's nothing to save because the traced program was not installed (left no files/registry items)
Messages.msgCancelTracing: Do you wish to cancel current installation tracing?
Messages.msgStopTracing: Installation tracing will be stopped now. Do you wish to save current tracing results?
Messages.msgEntryAlreadyExists: The program '%s' already exists in the list, so please choose another name.
Messages.msgStartupDeleteConfirm: Dette sletter oppføringen helt fra registret (Auto-start).\n\nEr du sikker på at du vil fortsette?
Messages.msgCannotAddNewStartupItem: Feil ved å legge til oppstartsprogram. Vennligst sjekk administratorrettigheter, eller kontakt programsupport for assistanse.
Messages.msgCantModifyAutorunEntry: Kan ikke modifisere egenskapene til denne oppføringen. Du har kanskje ikke rettigheter til dette.\n\nVennligst kontakt systemadministrator for assistanse.
Messages.msgRemoveMultipleItemsQuestion: Are you sure you want to remove these items?
Messages.msgRemoveMultipleItemsDescription: This will remove the items above from your system registry (start menu) and they will never run when your Windows starts.
Messages.msgRegRestartRequired: For å gjøre ferdig registreringen, må du restarte programmet.\n\nVil du avslutte programmet nå?
Messages.msgCannotConnectToCrystalIDEA: Kan ikke koble til crystalidea.com webside. Vennligst sjekk internett-tilkoblingen.
Messages.msgRunningInWow64: You're not supposed to run 32-bit version of Uninstall Tool on 64-bit Windows as it displays only 32-bit applications and has a wide range of limitations. It's highly recommended to download and reinstall Uninstall Tool on this machine (it will automatically choose 64-bit version when installing on a 64-bit Windows).
Messages.msgCannotStartHelper: Unable to start 'UninstallToolHelper.exe' process. \n\nPlease reintall the program.
Messages.msgUninstallingMyself: Do you want to remove Uninstall Tool preferences and all data about traced installations?

Trial.msgNotAvailableInTrial: Denne funksjonen er kun tilgjengelig i den registrerte versjonen av programmet.
Trial.msgNotAvailableInTrial2: You can save the leftover data and delete it later by using Force Removal feature on the '%s' item in the list.
Trial.checkDeleteDataLater: Save and delete the leftover data later

ShellExtension.InstallWithInstallTracker: Install and trace with Install Tracker...
ShellExtension.InstallWithInstallTrackerTip: Install and trace all the changes a program makes on your computer
ShellExtension.uninstallWithUninstallToolFailed: Unable to detect any application based on the provided shortcut:
ShellExtension.uninstallWithUninstallToolConfirm: Are you sure you want to completely remove '%s' and all of its components?

UnhandledExceptionHandler.msgTemplate:
We're sorry but an unhandled exception has occurred and 
%app_name% has become unstable. 
Please send us an e-mail to '%email%'
attaching the following crash dump file:

%dump_file%

After pressing 'Send Report' button, a default mailer program 
will be opened with composed message.
UnhandledExceptionHandler.MailBodyTemplate:
Hello, Support.

I'm having a problem with %app_name%. The dump file is attached.
(don't forget to attach the file %dump_file%)

My Windows version is %winver% and my actions before the problem were... (put some words please)

Setup.install_service: Install tracing service ('Install and Trace' feature)
Setup.control_panel_icon_text: Add Uninstall Tool icon to Control Panel
Setup.pin_to_taskbar_text: Pin Uninstall Tool icon to the taskbar
Setup.skip_uac_option: Simplify app launch by using Windows Task Scheduler to bypass User Account Control confirmation
